letters.description: Identify the specific clinical markers of exhaustion, cynicism, and reduced professional efficacy.
Audit systemic environmental stressors, energy-depleting habits, and internal drivers of perfectionism.
Implement nervous system regulation and somatic protocols to transition the client into a restorative state.
Shift the client's cognitive mindset to decouple personal self-worth from productivity and performance.
Design a sustainable daily structure that balances high-performance output with intentional recovery cycles.
Reconnect the client with their core values, personal agency, and unique sense of purpose.
Develop a long-term resilience protocol to prevent future relapse and sustain professional well-being.
